message:
Dear HR Team,

The candidate {{ doc.applicant_name }} has provided their availability for the interview for the position of {{ doc.position }} at {{ doc.company }}.

  • Preferred Interview Dates: {{ doc.preferred_dates }}
  • Preferred Interview Time: {{ doc.preferred_time }}

Please review the details and proceed with scheduling the interview accordingly.

Best regards,
The HR Team
